name: First Presbyterian Church
description: First Presbyterian Church is a congregation of the Presbyterian Church (USA) located in London, Kentucky. The church serves the community through worship services, Sunday School, and various outreach programs including food assistance. Their mission is to share the good news of Jesus Christ by studying his word, worshipping together, and serving the Lord through outreach. The church offers a welcoming environment where people can heal and grow at their own pace.
source: Verified from official website, Google Business listing, and multiple online directories
hours: Sunday Worship: 9:30 AM, Sunday School: 10:30 AM
services: Worship services, Sunday School, food assistance, community outreach, disaster relief, spiritual counseling, religious education
eligibility: Open to all community members seeking spiritual guidance and assistance
notes: Pastor: Griffin Ryan. Member of Synod of Living Waters and Transylvania Presbytery. Offers both in-person and online worship services. Provides food assistance and community support programs.
